title: Developers & Researchers
description: By contributing to the success of QuantiModo, you'll enjoy ongoing royalties in proportion to your contributions.

title: Health Platforms
description: Apple Health, Fitbit, and other platforms can integrate with QuantiModo to provide users with deeper insights from their health data through our analytics engine.

title: Users & Patients
description: Discover what improves YOUR health through personal analytics. Get real-time insights to optimize your diet, sleep, exercise, and supplements based on your own data.

title: Digital Health
description: Health startups can use our platform to reduce development costs by 80%. Focus on your unique value proposition instead of rebuilding data aggregation, analytics, and visualization features.

title: Non-Profits
description: Disease advocacy organizations can run studies for specific conditions using our platform. Engage members in meaningful research instead of traditional charity walks.

title: Government
description: Reduce healthcare costs through preventive insights discovered from population health data. Countries using shared open-source infrastructure can reduce development costs significantly.
